name: Anima of Life
description:
Azerite energy courses through your veins, increasing maximum health by 61 every 5 sec, stacking up to 10 times. While at maximum stacks, heal for 35 health every 5 sec.

Gain a stack of Anima of Life when you kill an enemy that yields experience or honor.

This effect is lost if you fall below 35% health.
